text: Ezɨ kɨ kamaghɨn ia mɨgei, Gumazir manam uan amuimɨn garima, a gumazir igharazitam ko akuiz puvatɨzɨ a pura anetaki, gumazir kam uan amuim gamima a poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim gami. Eghtɨ amizir kam gumazir igharazitamɨn ikiam, a poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim gami. Eghtɨ gumazitam amizir pam ataghizimɨn ikɨva, egh gumazir kam uaghan poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim gami.”
